overview: As Brendan Phillips watches a cam show online, he fantasizes about having a big cock. Andy Banks has been camming solo for a while and receives a direct message from Brendan. Jason Maddox rises early for his morning run and notices Scott Riley on his stoop. Marching out to deal with it he brings Scott inside to call the police. When Ian Levine shows up "by chance" at Dylan Knight's house fundraising for the soccer team, he acts surprised as his teacher answers the door. Zak Bishop catches Arad out of the corner of his eye and notices the handsome stranger eyeing him. With a look, it's obvious they both have one thing on their minds.
title: Hard For You
